description: A WhatsApp Bot by xh_clinton to roast noobs and rule chats! 💥

SESSION_ID.description: Drop your SESSION_ID here, or Toxic-MD will haunt you! Starts with Toxic-MD~ 😎

PREFIX.description: Set the command prefix, like . or !. No nulls, you noob! 😤

BOT_NAME.description: Name your bot. It’s Toxic-MD, so don’t mess it up! 😈

OWNER_NAME.description: The legend behind the bot. xh_clinton, who else? 😎

OWNER_NUMBER.description: Owner numbers, comma-separated. Don’t screw this up! 😡

STICKER_NAME.description: Sticker pack name. Toxic-MD stickers slap hard! 💀

MODE.description: Bot mode: public, private, inbox, or groups. Choose wisely! 😏

ALWAYS_ONLINE.description: Set true to keep Toxic-MD online 24/7, ready to roast! 🔥

AUTO_STATUS_SEEN.description: Set true to auto-view statuses like a creep! 👀

AUTO_STATUS_REACT.description: Set true to auto-react to statuses with toxic emojis! 😈

AUTO_STATUS_REPLY.description: Set true to auto-reply to statuses and clown them! 😜

AUTO_STATUS_MSG.description: Custom status reply message. Make it savage! 💥

ANTI_LINK.description: Set true to nuke group links. No spammers allowed! 🚫

DELETE_LINKS.description: Set true to delete links without kicking. Be nice... or not! 😏

MENTION_REPLY.description: Set true for auto voice replies when mentioned. Annoy everyone! 😤

MENU_IMAGE_URL.description: URL for menu/mention images. Make it dope or get roasted! 🎨

ANTI_BAD.description: Set true to delete bad words. Keep it clean or get wrecked! 😡

DESCRIPTION.description: Caption for menu and more. Powered by xh_clinton, bow down! 😎

AUTO_VOICE.description: Set true for auto voice replies. Spam those chats! 🗣️

AUTO_STICKER.description: Set true for auto stickers. Slap ‘em with Toxic-MD! 😈

AUTO_REPLY.description: Set true for auto text replies. Flood the chat! 💬

AUTO_RECORDING.description: Set true for auto recording. Be that annoying bot! 🎙️

AUTO_TYPING.description: Set true to show typing. Tease those noobs! ⌨️

AUTO_REACT.description: Set true to react to every message. Spam emojis! 😈

CUSTOM_REACT.description: Set true for custom reactions. Be extra toxic! 😎

CUSTOM_REACT_EMOJIS.description: Custom emojis for reactions. Go wild, you savage! 😈

ANTI_DEL_PATH.description: Set to 'same' to resend deleted messages in same chat. Be sneaky! 🕵️

READ_MESSAGE.description: Set true to auto-read all messages. Stalk much? 👀
